long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple and easy to use extension to customise your New Tab experience for Chrome.

Designed to be as simple as possible it features:
- Search box with typing suggestions
- Up to 18 user customised quick links
- White and Dark Themes
- Patriotic theme for Belarusian users :)

Latest Updates:
- Animation Performance fix
- Flag animation improved
- Fixed cross device sync bugs
